data.eml:eml: Mursia spiridonovi, new name for Mursia minuta Spiridonov & Apel, 2007 preoccupied by Mursia minuta Karasawa, 1993 (Decapoda: Brachyura: Calappidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Karasawa, Hiroaki (2018): Mursia spiridonovi, new name for Mursia minuta Spiridonov & Apel, 2007 preoccupied by Mursia minuta Karasawa, 1993 (Decapoda: Brachyura: Calappidae). Zootaxa 4375 (4): 587, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4375.4.8
